name: Chain Reaction (itch) (Diannara)
description:
In this game you play as a knight wielding a mace on a chain. Move around with W, S, A, D and the mace will follow with your momentum. Use the mace to attack your enemies and kill them for points.

Knocking enemies into each other will cause a chain reaction. Killing enemies with a chain reaction will cause them to drop coins. Coins are worth an additional 250 points when picked up.

Goblins take 3 hits to kill
Red Knights take 5 hits to kill
Note: Chaining enemies into each other will deal damage to both even if they are currently invincible against you.

Killing a Red Knight is tough, but if you manage to do it they will drop a powerup. Green gems provide a speed boost, Teal gems provide temporary invincibility, and Purple gems provide a damage boost. These bonuses only last for 5 seconds so use them wisely.

Try and get the high score and login via Azure PlayFab to compete on the leaderboard!

Game-Icons.net

The Intergalactic Beets Project - Full-Length Song Collection I
